data.actual_result: The user is not mentioned, retaining the username and discriminator
data.expected_result: The user is mentioned as if a normal user
data.short_description: Mentioning users whose username contains, but not begins with, . (dot) right after any characters, except whitespace, cannot be parsed
data.steps_to_repro: - Change your testing account's username into name that containing, but not beginning with, dot (e.g. E.G) - Enter your testing server - Mention that user and make sure there are something right, except whitespace, before the at-sign (i.e. (at)E.G#0000 or Hi(at)E.G#0000)
